channel.title: Automation on Raph's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Automation on Raph's Blog

item.title: Tips to Automate Yourself Out of a Job
item.description: Providing tools, processes, and platforms that automate everything, including yourself out of a job should be the goal of everyone in IT. It’s something people rant about on Twitter, speak about on YouTube, and attempt to inspire on LinkedIn. Everyone seems to be telling us we _should_Â automate our jobs, not many are telling us how. Today I have a few practical things you can do to actualise this goal.
